exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface cti : cronies_term_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface Unable to unify "forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets ?M5303) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> 0 < prevLogTerm -> candidateEntriesTerm prevLogTerm (nwState ?M5303)" with "prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm_interface".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
cti: cronies_term_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm_interface

VotesCorrectInterface.votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => VotesCorrectInterface.one_vote_per_term net /\ VotesCorrectInterface.votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct net /\ VotesCorrectInterface.currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments VotesCorrectInterface.votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

init_handlers = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) => mkRaft_data 0 None None [] 0 0 init [] [] false [] Follower [] [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data Arguments init_handlers {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_received_leaders = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h)))) = true : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_received_leaders {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
cronies_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (t : term), In h (cronies (fst (nwState net h')) t) -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h')) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
cronies_votes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (candidate : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net candidate)) t) -> In (t, candidate) (votes (fst (nwState net crony))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_votes {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
elections_ghost_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| GhostSimulations.ghost_data := electionsData; GhostSimulations.ghost_init := {| votes := []; votesWithLog := []; cronies := fun _ : term => []; leaderLogs := []; allEntries := [] |}; GhostSimulations.ghost_net_handlers := update_elections_data_net; GhostSimulations.ghost_input_handlers := update_elections_data_input |} : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), GhostSimulations.GhostMultiParams multi_params Arguments elections_ghost_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
VotesCorrectInterface.one_vote_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n n' : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, n') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> n = n' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments VotesCorrectInterface.one_vote_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
VotesCorrectInterface.currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n -> In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments VotesCorrectInterface.currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
VotesCorrectInterface.votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments VotesCorrectInterface.votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_received_cronies = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_received_cronies {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> 0 < prevLogTerm -> candidateEntriesTerm prevLogTerm (nwState net) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

```coq
intros net p t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit H.
apply PrevLogCandidateEntriesTermInterface.prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm_invariant.
apply refined_raft_intermediate_reachable.
assumption.
Qed.```
